home.title: TAIKAI - Hackathon Platform
home.description: Participate in online virtual, offline, and web3 hackathons. We offer builders an innovative way to learn new skills, build cool projects, earn rewards, and grow your network.
home.error: Oops! Something went wrong, try again later.

homepage.page_description: Participate in online virtual, offline, and web3 hackathons. We offer builders an innovative way to learn new skills, build cool projects, earn rewards, and grow your network.
homepage.hero_description: TAIKAI is a hackathon platform that connects companies with talented developers to create solutions. We offer innovators a fun and exciting way to learn new skills, build cool projects, and earn rewards.
homepage.start_hacking_title: It’s time to build that cool project you’ve always wanted
homepage.taikai_garden_description_1: Welcome to TAIKAI Garden, where hackathon projects find the perfect soil to grow! We've created a vibrant ecosystem where your projects can put down roots and flourish. In the Garden, we reward innovation and collaboration. It's not just about planting your ideas; it's about nurturing them into thriving businesses.
homepage.taikai_garden_description_2: Ready to turn your project into a blooming success story? Join the TAIKAI Garden waitlist today.
homepage.taikai_garden_waitlist_form_success: You joined the TAIKAI Garden waitlist with success. Soon you will contacted by our team.
homepage.start_hacking_description: Compete in prestigious global hackathons, develop your skills, learn new tech, and win prizes - all while having fun, too.
homepage.start_hacking_showcase_description: Customize your presentation and pitch your project to the world. You got this.
homepage.start_hacking_prizes_description: We believe that hackathons should be more than just winning. That's why we offer tokens to all participants who create valuable projects.
homepage.start_hacking_ui_description: Never lose track of your hard work. Upload your project assets, stay up-to-date with the next steps and access the challenge information with an easy and user-friendly interface.
homepage.start_hacking_pop_description: Receive on-chain NFT that showcases the projects you were involved in.
homepage.start_hacking_sign-in-eth_description: Control your digital identity with an Ethereum account and ENS profile, bypassing traditional intermediaries.
homepage.start_hacking_team_description: Looking to join forces? We got you covered. Use our matchmaking system to find teammates or get invited by other teams to participate in the competition.
homepage.hackathons_title: Discover new challenges to participate in
homepage.for_organizations_description: Managing a hackathon can be a challenge without the right tools. We simplified this process to create a better platform experience for your organization.
homepage.for_organizations_setup_description: Streamline your event planning and execution with our hackathon management platform. All the features you need to run a successful hackathon such as participant registration, team matchmaking, event timeline, internal chat, and more - in a single tool.
homepage.for_organizations_custom_page_descriptio: Convert more participants with a complete and well-organized landing page. Customize your brand and assets with all the information required for your challenge and a simple registration process.
homepage.features_title: All the tools you need, in a single platform
homepage.features_livestream_description: Livestream events on the platform such as webinars, Q&As, or any other type of live experience.
homepage.features_dashboard_description: Allow participants to submit their projects in rich formats with images, videos, and attachments, in a user-friendly environment for participants and judge.
homepage.features_voting_description: Evaluating the best projects was never so simple. All you need is to define the best criteria that match your goals and leave the rest with us.
homepage.features_webhooks_description: Don't waste time and energy managing things that could be automated. Sync your hackathon information and create workflows and automation for your event.
homepage.what_we_offer_audit_description_1: Keeping your security at the highest level is our top priority. Our web application has been rigorously audited and approved by <1>Hacken</1>, a leader in Blockchain Security Auditing, with a perfect
homepage.partners: Join over 100 partners that have hosted their hackathon challenges at TAIKAI
homepage.blog_title: Learn more about hackathons, web3 and TAIKAI
homepage.community_description: Join our ever-growing community and get access to the latest hackathons happening around the world. Our Discord is the place to discuss projects, form teams, contact support and share your ideas.
homepage.newsletter_description: Stay up-to-date with the developer economy and everything related to the ecosystem!
homepage.newsletter_error: Oops! Something went wrong, try again later.
homepage.request_demo_form_success: Request a demo submitted. Soon you will contacted by our team.
homepage.request_demo_form_error: Failed to submit request a demo request. Please try again or contact us by email.

navigation.navigation_projects_desc: Discover the latest projects on TAIKAI
navigation.navigation_top_desc: Find out where you rank in the leaderboard
navigation.navigation_host_desc: Launch your own hackathon and empower your community
navigation.navigation_web3_case_study_desc: Explore detailed case studies of successful web3 hackathons
navigation.navigation_consultancy_desc: Leverage our expertise in hackathon design and execution
navigation.navigation_blog_desc: Latest insights on TAIKAI and hackathons
navigation.navigation_academy_desc: Bite-sized content to help you learn about web3
navigation.navigation_xplorer_desc: Your gateway to the latest web3 events!
navigation.footer_description: The platform to Launch and Join Hackathons

common.support_page_description: TAIKAI support is here to help. Talk with us or submit a support request. We will talk with soon ASAP.
common.terms_page_description: This document regulates the Terms and Conditions in regards to the access, adherence and use of the TAIKAI hackathon platform

common.faq_page_description: Have questions or doubts about how TAIKAI works for innovators or corporate businesses, $TKAI and $VKAI tokens, our voting system or our economic incentives
common.blog_page_desc: Blog posts and stories in TAIKAI Hackathon Platform
common.description: Host online, virtual hackathons and open innovation challenges. Discover the best hackathons to engage. All-in-one hackathon platform solution.
common.you_are_a_mentor: Thanks, you are oficially a mentor on challenge.
common.are_you_sure_to_proceed_voting: Are you sure you want to proceed with this voting?
common.vote_action_is_irreversible: This action is irreversible and cannot be undone. After submitting these votes, you will not able to vote again so please check your votes carefully.
common.vote_token_action_is_irreversible: This action is irreversible and cannot be undone. After submitting your votes, you can continue to vote if your balance allows.
common.not_enough_balance_to_vote: Your balance does not allow to proceed with your voting proccess. Please edit your voting cart and try again.
common.not_enough_balance_automatic_vote: Your balance does not allow submit your amounts automatically at the end of the current step. Please edit your voting cart.
common.votes_submitted_with_success: Your votes were submitted with success.
common.failed_to_checkout_voting_cart: Failed to checkout your voting cart. Please try again or contact the support.
common.checkout_explained: Your evaluations will be submitted automatically at the end of the current step based on the scores you provided. This action is irreversible and cannot be undone, so please check your votes carefully.
common.token_automatically_checkout_explained: The amounts you provided will be submitted automatically at the end of the current step. This action is irreversible and cannot be undone, so please check your votes carefully.
common.all_available_balance: You are putting all your available balance into one project only.
common.no_going_back: Once you checkout your votes, there is no going back. Please be certain.
common.maintenance_desc_1: Yup, we're under a scheduled maintenance! 👨🏻‍💻

common.invalid_video_url: The video URL format is invalid.
common.you_will_be_redirected_in_a_few_seconds: You will be redirected in a few seconds

common.tkai_page_description: TKAI is an ERC20 utility token powering the TAIKAI platform economy. TKAI official contract addresses and base tokenomics.
common.point_system_page_description: Points is a gamification system that allows you to earn complete Quests on TAIKAI to earn Points and trade them for rewards.

comment.delete_description: Deleting this comment is irreversible. <1>Are you sure that you would like to continue?</1>

settings.confirm_delete_account: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete your account?
settings.confirm_delete_account_label: Please, type your username below to confirm:
settings.confirm_delete_account_description: By proceeding to this action, you are sure that it can not be undone.
settings.delete_account_description: We comply with the GDPR rules, and this process will permanently remove all your information from our database.
settings.delete_account_description_2: This process will permanently remove all your information from our database, and that includes all rewards and $TKAI and $VKAI tokens.
settings.choose_notifications: Choose notifications that do you want to receive
settings.verification_explanation: Phone verification is required to access some features (e.q. redeem vouchers).
settings.2fa_explanation: Two-factor authentication is an extra layer of protection for your TAIKAI account. When turned on, a second factor will be required to sign in to your account on a new device.
settings.2fa_enabled: Two-factor authentication is turned on for your account.
settings.2fa_disabled: Two-factor authentication is turned off for your account.
settings.2fa_disable_success: Two-factor authentication is turned off for your account.
settings.backup_error_password: Something wrong! Please review your password and try again.
settings.disable_2fa_password: For security, please enter your password:
settings.2fa_scan_message: On your mobile device install an authenticator app and use it to scan the QR code. After you scan it, you'll see a six-digit authentication code.
settings.2fa_trouble: Trouble scanning? You can enter this secret instead:
settings.2fa_code_placeholder: Enter the 6-digit authentication code, then click
settings.backup_code_placeholder: Get a backup code to use when you can't access your phone. You can use this one-time backup code to access your account.
settings.backup_code_keep_safe: Write it down and keep it safe.
settings.finish_placeholder: Your TAIKAI account is now protected by two-factor authentication. To continue using your account on other devices or to sign in to it on a new device, you'll need to enter a six-digit authentication code from your authenticator app.
settings.please_provide_otp_code: Please provide current code from your authenticator app
settings.backup_code_info: You can use this backup code to access your account:
settings.search_engines_desc: Hide your profile from search engines. It could take some time to hide your profile from search results and ir varies by search engine.
settings.job_seeking_preferences_desc: Show hackathon organizers that you are open to work.
settings.private_account_desc: Control who can see your profile.
settings.invite_to_join: Invite your friends to join TAIKAI and, for each one who signup and validate his account,
settings.access_referral_programa: How can I access the referral program?
settings.how_access_referral_programa: To have access to the referral program, you need to participate in a hackathon, as a participant or as a judge, and be eligible to receive rewards for your project or for your investments. If your project or your investment is in the Top 10, or among the finalists of a hackathon, then you will have access to the referral program.
settings.validate_and_invite: Validate your account and share your invite link with your friends and
settings.see_invitation_status: See the status of your invitations with the unfinished process.
settings.share_your_invite_with_friends: Share your invite link with your friends and
settings.error_sending_to_phone: There was an error sending a message to your phone number.
settings.error_validatin_code: There was an error validating the code.
settings.2fa_code_error: Please review the code and try again
settings.code_placeholder: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to your phone number.
settings.language_desc: Choose the language you want to use in TAIKAI. This setting affects the TAIKAI platform and e-mails that you receive from us.
settings.update_email_to_activate_notifications: You cannot receive email notifications because you do not have any email addresses associated with your account.

connected_accounts.label: Connected Accounts
connected_accounts.description: Manage apps you connected to your account to log in
connected_accounts.disconnect_metamask_wallet_description: By disconnecting your wallet, it will not be possible for you to log in to our system.
connected_accounts.cant_disconnect_ethereum_account: Cannot disconnect this account. To do it, you have to delete your account

change_username.label: Change username
change_username.description: You can change your current username, but be aware that if you already shared your profile link before, the link won't work anymore, and you need to share the new one.
change_username.description_procedure_2: You can choose a new one in the field below.

change_email.label: Change email
change_email.description_procedure_2: A confirmation will be sent to this account. Click on the confirmation link to verify and add this email.

deposit_and_withdraw.label: Deposit & Withdraw
deposit_and_withdraw.enable_2fa_to_continue: You must have the Two-Factor Authentication method active to make withdrawals. You can activate it on the <1>settings page</1>.
deposit_and_withdraw.balance_description_1: The amount above is your current balance that reflects the total of the TKAI token in your TAIKAI wallet.
deposit_and_withdraw.balance_description_2: You can get $TKAI tokens through transfers from other users, our <1>referral program</1>, rewards from TAIKAI hackathons, and deposits. If you want to learn more about rewards and how they are calculated, read our <2>blog post</2>.
deposit_and_withdraw.withdraw_description: The transfer will take place at the Polygon Network (ERC20). Sending $TKAI to the wrong address could mean losing your funds. When in doubt, send a small amount first.
deposit_and_withdraw.deposit_description: Send only $TKAI to this deposit address and ensure the network is Polygon Network (ERC20). Please do not send NFTs to this address.
deposit_and_withdraw.associated_account_warning: The inserted address <1>{{address}}</1> is associated to <1>{{associatedAddress}}</1>.

challenges.no_assets: Here you can add attachments to your project, like images or documents. All the images will appear inside a slider at the top of the page with a 16/9 aspect ratio.
challenges.unpublished_project_desc: This is a draft project that only you and your team can view. After editing your project, don't forget to publish it.
challenges.empty_gallery: Here you can have a slider with your presentation video and project images. To add a video, please click on the button above, and to add images, please add them to the attachments section at the bottom of the page.

invite_team_members_by_email.description: The person will automatically be your team member if he/she is already registered as a participant. Otherwise, he/she will be asked to first register as a participant in the hackathon <1>{{challengeName}}</1>.
invite_team_members_by_email.domain_whitelist_only: It's only acceptable the emails within the available domains: <1>{{registrationDomainsWhiteList}}</1>.

platform_feedback_program.title: We need your feedback
platform_feedback_program.description: Only feedback can move us forward, and your inputs are super important to us. We thank you for replying to our feedback form regarding your experience with the platform.

fork_project_modal.title: Turn into a seed project
fork_project_modal.description:
TAIKAI Garden serves as a fertile ground for innovation, experimentation, and collaboration within the ecosystem, empowering aspiring entrepreneurs, developers, and visionaries to shape their ideas into fully-fledged projects with the support of a community.

If you proceed with this action, you will be redirected to TAIKAI Garden to confirm the data related to your project and turn it into a seed project. If you want to know more, visit the Garden or read the TAIKAI Garden whitepaper.

challenge_industry_filter.industry_description: Platform to host your hackathons and innovation challenges. Discover the latest {{industry}} hackathons at TAIKAI.

stories.title: Introducing Points: complete quests, earn points, and get rewards!
stories.shortDescription: Points is a gamification system coming to TAIKAI that allows you to earn Complete Quests to earn Points and trade them for rewards.

stories.title: 6 Easy tips to win more hackathons
stories.title_br: 6 dicas fáceis para ganhar mais hackathons
stories.shortDescription: Every hackathon is different, but there are some valuable tips that you should follow to increase your chances.
stories.shortDescription_br: Cada hackathon é diferente, mas existem algumas dicas valiosas que você deve seguir para aumentar suas chances.

stories.title: How to organize an Internal Hackathon
stories.shortDescription: Discover how internal hackathons can drive innovation within your business by fostering new products, creative solutions, and enhanced collaboration.
stories.shortDescription_br: Para organizar um hackathon interno, você deve primeiro alinhar objetivos, definir regras, buscar mentores e selecionar uma plataforma confiável.

stories.title: 10 Reasons to Use a Hackathon Platform
stories.title_br: 10 razões para usar uma Plataforma Hackathon para um desafio online
stories.shortDescription: A Hackathon management platform IS an all-in-one solution for your challenge. Here are 10 reasons why.
stories.shortDescription_br: Da criação do projeto aos participantes do gerenciamento. Descubra por que uma plataforma de gerenciamento de hackathon impulsionará seu hackathon online.

stories.shortDescription: New to web3 hackathons? Learn how TAIKAI consultancy landed 390 participants on this Starkware Hackathon case study.
